00014 #ifndef funcsynthH
00015 #define funcsynthH
00016 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017 #include "primarydriver.h"
00018 #include "xnodeconnector.h"
00019 
00020 class QMainWindow;
00021 class Ui_FrmFuncSynth;
00022 typedef QForm<QMainWindow, Ui_FrmFuncSynth> FrmFuncSynth;
00023 
00024 class XFuncSynth : public XPrimaryDriver
00025 {
00026     XNODE_OBJECT
00027 protected:
00028     XFuncSynth(const char *name, bool runtime,
00029                const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00030                const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00031                const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00032                const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00033 public:
00034     //! usually nothing to do
00035     virtual ~XFuncSynth() {}
00036     //! show all forms belonging to driver
00037     virtual void showForms();
00038 protected:
00039     //! Start up your threads, connect GUI, and activate signals
00040     virtual void start();
00041     //! Shut down your threads, unconnect GUI, and deactivate signals
00042     //! this may be called even if driver has already stopped.
00043     virtual void stop();
00044   
00045     //! this is called when raw is written 
00046     //! unless dependency is broken
00047     //! convert raw to record
00048     virtual void analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&);
00049     //! this is called after analyze() or analyzeRaw()
00050     //! record is readLocked
00051     virtual void visualize();
00052   
00053     //! driver specific part below
00054     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &output() const {return m_output;}
00055     const shared_ptr<XNode> &trig() const {return m_trig;} //!< trigger to burst
00056     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &mode() const {return m_mode;}
00057     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &function() const {return m_function;}
00058     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &freq() const {return m_freq;} //!< [Hz]
00059     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &amp() const {return m_amp;} //!< [Vp-p]
00060     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &phase() const {return m_phase;} //!< [deg.]
00061     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &offset() const {return m_offset;} //!< [V]
00062 protected:
00063     virtual void onOutputChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) = 0;
00064     virtual void onTrigTouched(const shared_ptr<XNode> &) = 0;
00065     virtual void onModeChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) = 0;
00066     virtual void onFunctionChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) = 0;
00067     virtual void onFreqChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) = 0;
00068     virtual void onAmpChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) = 0;
00069     virtual void onPhaseChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) = 0;
00070     virtual void onOffsetChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) = 0;
00071 private:
00072     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode>  m_output;
00073     const shared_ptr<XNode>  m_trig;
00074     const shared_ptr<XComboNode>  m_mode;
00075     const shared_ptr<XComboNode>  m_function;
00076     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode>  m_freq;
00077     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode>  m_amp;
00078     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode>  m_phase;
00079     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode>  m_offset;
00080     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnOutput, m_lsnMode, m_lsnFunction,
00081         m_lsnFreq, m_lsnAmp, m_lsnPhase, m_lsnOffset;
00082     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnTrig;
00083     xqcon_ptr m_conOutput, m_conTrig, m_conMode, m_conFunction,
00084         m_conFreq, m_conAmp, m_conPhase, m_conOffset;
00085 
00086     const qshared_ptr<FrmFuncSynth> m_form;
00087 };
